localised_text.tooltip_text: [[b]]The Captain Armoury[[/b]] ||View available bonuses to your faction that can be purchased with your pooled resource.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIf( MilitaryForceContext.FactionContext == PlayersFaction && self.IsVisibleFromRoot, ShowPrompt("", Loc("prompt_message_undeploy"), Undeploy, true, "", "", this))
DoIf( OwningForceContext.FactionContext == PlayersFaction && OwningForceContext.IsSelected && self.IsVisibleFromRoot, ShowPrompt("", Loc("prompt_message_disband"), DisbandUnit, true, "", "", this))

callback_with_context.context_function_id: CcoRTPredictedWealth( Income : (PlayersFaction.FactionEconomyContext .RegularIncome - PlayersFaction.FactionEconomyContext .RegularExpenditure) - Upkeep , Treasury : PlayersFaction.TreasuryAmount - Cost )

newstate.tooltip: Recruitment Cost||The cost for deploying this retinue as part of an army.

property.name: icon_ceo
property.value: (commander = StoredContext("CcoCampaignRecruitmentItemInfo").ForceRetinueContext.OwningRetinueContext.ActiveCommanderContext) =>(RequiredCEOs.IsEmpty == false && RequiredCEOs.All((ceo) => commander.HasCeoRecordEquipped(ceo)) == false) || (RestrictingCEOs.IsEmpty == false && RestrictingCEOs.Any((ceo) => commander.HasCeoRecordEquipped(ceo)))

callback_with_context.context_function_id:
(commander = StoredContext("CcoCampaignRecruitmentItemInfo").ForceRetinueContext.OwningRetinueContext.ActiveCommanderContext) => { GetIf(RequiredCEOs.IsEmpty == false && RequiredCEOs.All((ceo) => commander.HasCeoRecordEquipped(ceo)) == false, Format( Loc("unit_locked_ceo") + "
", RequiredCEOs.FirstContext.Title) ) + GetIf(RestrictingCEOs.IsEmpty == false && RestrictingCEOs.Any((ceo) => commander.HasCeoRecordEquipped(ceo)), Format( Loc("unit_locked_ceo_restricted") + "
", RestrictingCEOs.FirstContext.Title) ) + GetIf( RequiredBuildingsList.IsEmpty == false , Format( Loc("unit_locked_building") + "
", RequiredBuildingsList.FirstContext.PlayerVariantRecordContext.Name) ) + GetIf( RequiredMustBeWorldLeader && PlayersFaction.IsWorldLeader == false , Format( Loc("unit_locked_emperor") + "
") ) + GetIf(commander.Rank < RequiredCharacterRank , Format( Loc("unit_locked_rank") + "
" , RequiredCharacterRank) ) + GetIf( RequiredTechnologiesList.IsEmpty == false && RequiredTechnologiesList.Any( PlayerHasResearched == false) , Format( Loc("unit_locked_tech") + "
"))}
